Comments_List: A general mathematical understanding of how most data mining concepts work, many of which are the building blocks of modern machine learning techniques.
I liked how the course explained these concepts through proofs rather than just explaining the results. I wish the proofs were written on the board step by step rather than projected on powerpoint.
If you want to work in this area of computer science than definitely yes, you definitely need to have your own initiative to learn the material fully.
